name: Mitten (Loading Pine)
description:
This is our first game we've made, which was for the  Mini Jam 66: Sweets.  Feel free to let us know what you liked and what we can work on.  I hope you enjoy this peaceful place.

🍞 🍞 🍞 🍞 🍞 🍞 🍞 🍞 🍞
